testCase.name: Given a HandleUser component When it rendered And is loading Then it should show 'Loading...' message
Given a HandleUser component When it rendered And is error Then it should show login error message
Given a Header component When it rendered When the user is not logged in Then it should show text message for the not logged-in user
Given a Header component When it rendered Then it should show Login button
Given a Footer component When it rendered Then it should show text 'Made by Aleksandr Turchenko'
Given a Footer component When it rendered Then it should show button with GitHub link and icon
Given a Footer component When it rendered Then it should show button with LinkedIn link and icon
Given a HandleUser component When it rendered When the user is logged-in Then it should show message for logged-in user
Given a HandleUser component When it rendered Then it should show user profile button
Given a HandleUser component When it rendered Then it should show profile Logout button
Given a HandleUser component When it rendered Then it should show user settings button
Given a CreateTask component When it rendered It should show input area for task name
Given a CreateTask component When it rendered It should show input area for task description
Given a CreateTask component When it rendered It should show submit button
Given a TaskCard component When it rendered It should show button group
Given a TaskCard component When it rendered It should show delete button
Given a TaskCard component When it rendered It should show update Button
Given a TaskCard component When it rendered When a user click on delete button Then it should call onDelete function from props
Given a UpdateTaskDialog component When it rendered It should show update button
Given a UpdateTaskDialog component When it rendered When the user click on Update button Then it should show dialog modal
Given a UpdateTaskDialog component When it rendered When a user enter new task name and click on Save button Then it should call setUserTasks function with updated task
